column1: gentle good-length ball outside off stump, defended off the front foot
back of a length outside off, tries to drag this square off the back foot, inside edge ricochets onto his pads
good length on middle stump, tapped back past the non-striker, and Nabi has to give this ball a chase
first-ball duck! Good length ball outside off and zipping straight through, tried to cut late, but takes the outside edge. Sharp take from the keeper
full outside off, tapped back to Nabi off the front foot
good length on middle and leg, flicked off his hips, but straight to midwicket. Just one off the over
full on middle and leg, clipped off his pads to the leg side, but well stopped by midwicket
full on off stump and driven firmly down the ground, intercepted by the man at mid on
good length outside off and Roy dances down the ground, tries to drive down the ground but inside edge takes it through to short fine leg. Lucky that it didn't go back into leg stump
back of a length on off stump, stays deep in his crease and punches off the back foot. Straight to cover
full on middle and leg, clipped off his toes to the leg side, but straight to the fielder at midwicket. Can't find the gaps at the moment. Can Richardson start off with a maiden?
slower ball, yorker on off stump, Roy can only dig this back to the bowler. And that's a maiden over!
full just outside off stump, driven towards the vacant mid-on region, Nabi has to give in another chase
full on leg stump, flicked off his pads into the deep. Deep midwicket comes in and keeps it down to a single
back of a length outside off, backs away exposing his stumps to find that extra room, but cut straight to point
full on middle stump, driven off the back foot towards cover, but it can't thread the gap. Well fielded by cover point, but can't stop the single
full just outside off, shimmies down and turns this to cow corner
full and wide outside off and it's slapped inside out over cover. A couple of bounces, and into the wide long-off boundary
slower ball full outside off, swings hard at this loosener, but can only hit this to the man at long on

full outside off, and that's hit over the infield, but wait! Finch, at mid off, puts his hand out and the ball sticks! Almost cleared the infield before the local boy takes an incredible catch. Roy has to go
slower ball full outside off, carved square off the front foot, but can't find the gap. Straight to point
back of a length outside off but angling into the right hander, tries to glance this fine down the leg side but bottom edges it onto his toes
another slower ball, full on middle stump. Tries to muscle it past the bowler, but hits it into the ground. Bravo puts his right hand out and stops the ball from going past
good length on off stump, jammed to third man off the back foot. Cramped him for room there
full on off stump and smashed back to Richardson, tries to stop the ball by sticking his foot out, and blocks it, but looks like he's pulled a hamstring in the process
good length on off stump, defended with soft hands as Silk looks for the single, but Richardson collects swiftly on the follow through. Another dot
short outside off and it's pulled furiously over midwicket to the man in the deep. Well struck but only a single
back of a length on middle stump, defended off the back foot with the bat's open face, played down to point
short on middle stump, extra bounce off the surface, Maddinson waits deep in the crease and ramps this down to third man from near his head
full on off stump, bunted down the ground to mid on, they scamper through for the quick run
back of a length outside off, tapped past the non-striker to long on. Not off the middle of the bat
short on middle stump, tries to cut this over point but the extra bounce takes the ball over his flashing blade. Nice carry through to the keeper
back of a length on off stump, Maddinson charges down the ground and hits this into the ground. Intercepted by the man running in from cover
good length on middle stump, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket. Just the one boundary all innings so far
good length on middle stump, worked off his pads behind square past the man at short fine leg, stopped by deep backward square charging in
full outside off, driven down the ground but not off the middle of the bat. Goes to Finch at mid off. Sixers at 20 for 2 after the Powerplay
good length on leg stump, Silk backs away and muscles this towards the leg side
tossed up full on leg stump, flicked off his toes to deep midwicket. The bowlers still keeping it down to ones and twos
short ball on middle stump, spins slightly away from the right hander, drags his pull along the carpet to the man at deep midwicket
tossed up full on off stump, worked off his toes to wide long off. Flight offered this time, but Maddinson can't get under that delivery
good length on leg stump, and spins into the batsman on this occasion, worked off his pads to deep backward square
back of a length on off stump, spins away from the left hander, tapped back along the ground to see the over out
back of a length outside off, makes some room and slaps this over the fielder at point. Quick to pounce on that loose ball, and this time it clears the infield
good length wide outside off, Silk backed away too much as Nabi pushes this wide. Cut along the ground to deep point
back of a length outside off, but angling into Maddinson, punched off the back foot to cover
tossed up full on off stump, driven along the ground to wide long on
back of a length on middle stump, Silk backs away and muscles this towards cow corner off the back foot
good length on off stump, worked towards mid on off the front foot
good length on middle stump, pulled off the back foot, goes along the carpet to deep midwicket

tossed up full on middle stump, driven along the ground but it takes a leading edge, taken easily by White at long off. A check-drive from the batsman that doesn't have the distance. The ol' dog strikes!

flat ball short on middle stump, pulled over square leg, but not off the meat of the bat. The two men in the deep give it a chase, and stop the ball from just inside the ropes, allows Maddinson to take the second
short on middle stump, goes deep and punches this off the back foot to mid on
full on leg stump and spins into the batsman's pads, tries to work this behind square on the leg side, but straight to short fine leg
good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot to cover
good length on leg stump, cramps Maddinson for room once more. He can only drive this off the back foot to long on. Keeping it tight, here
full on off stump, defended back to Wildermuth
good length outside off, comes down the ground and taps this to point
back of a length on middle stump, shuffles across to the off side and clips this to deep backward square
good length on middle stump, backs away and taps this into the ground, trickles away towards the man at point
slow yorker on middle stump, worked off his toes to deep midwicket
full outside off and driven down the ground. Tries to muscle it with much power, but the bat turns in his hand. Doesn't help that Bravo takes almost all the pace off the ball
back of a length outside off and angling further away, slapped away from his body past cover point to the deep
short on off stump and zips off the surface! Surprises Billings with the extra bounce. Goes over his shoulders through to the keeper
slower ball that's eventually a low full toss on middle stump, clipped off his hips fine down the leg side for a very useful boundary. Crazy dip off Bravo's release of the ball
full on off stump and smacked with immense power, but straight to cover
overpitched on leg stump, turned off his toes to cow corner. Slight tangle between Billings and Bravo at the non-striker's as the West Indian collects the ball from the throw. Smiles all around
full on off stump and driven along the ground. Too straight, as it hits breaks the stumps at the non-striker's. Maddinson would've been out if the bowler got a finger to it
short outside off and pulled behind square, Marcus Harris has to give it a chase before he can pull the ball back. An acrobatic effort, that saves atleast two runs
back of a length outside off, tries to pull but extra bounce surprises Billings. Hits his arm, as the keeper says 'catch it'! Falls short of cover point, though
good length outside off, opens the bat's face and glances this to point
back of a length on middle stump, tapped off the back foot with soft hands, goes down the ground, allowing the batsmen to turn back for the double
good length on leg stump, clipped off his pads towards the gap near cow corner, another sprint for the batsmen as they finish the over with two more

back of a length on off stump and spins into the right hander, smacks his pad as the bowler goes up for the appeal, but Maddinson, the non-striker, is halfway down the pitch! Super pick-up-and-throw from Bravo at short third man, and it's a direct hit! Maddinson is inches short, as his bat gets stuck near the crease. He's got to go!
full ball on middle stump, shimmies down the ground and converts this into a full toss, clipped off his toes to cow corner
back of a length on off stump, backs away and cuts square, but the infielder are alert

Billings loses his balance as he tries to cut, and the keeper's quick to remove the bails! Great take from the gloveman, as the good-length ball spins away from Billings' body. Quick to take the bails off, but his back foot came down in time. Phew
full on middle and leg, nudged off his pads to the deep on the leg side
flatter ball short on off stump, pulled down the ground to mid on. Great over from Hogg
good length on middle and leg but drifting down the leg side, glanced off his hips fine enough to beat the man inside the circle. No fine leg in place, and that's a very useful boundary
back of a length outside off, tries to carve this behind square but inside edge comes onto Abbott's pads
good length outside off and it's firmly struck down the ground, but straight down Bravo's throat at long off. Abbott walks back, distraught
good length outside off, walks across to the off side and turns this off his hips to midwicket, they call early for the single

good length outside off, opens the bat's face and tries to run this down to third man, but played too square. Straight to point. They want the single, but decide against it. Good call, since the throw broke the stumps
good length outside off, driven square off the back foot, but straight to cover point. Another dot to end the over

slogged, but doesn't have the distance! Good length outside off and Sams tries to send this into the crowd, but it's not off the middle of the bat. Taken by wide long off racing to his right. Another wicket for the Afghan
full on off stump, firmly driven past midwicket, and it's racing away off the surface. Valiant chase from long off
full on middle and leg, comes down the ground and nudges this into the gap past midwicket. Run rate still below 5
slower, loopy ball outside off stump, defended back to the bowler off the front foot
back of a length outside off, backs away and cuts this behind square, but the infield is packed on the off side
full ball just outside off, Botha punches this off the back foot to mid off

low full toss on his hips, and it's smacked behind square on the leg side. Good work from fine leg, who slides to his left and stops the boundary. Another loose ball, that the Sixers failed to maximise off
short outside off, stays deep in his crease and guides this to point
short on middle stump and it's pulled over the square-leg umpire. There's the man positioned in the deep though
full outside off, comes down the ground, and pings this to wide long on
full outside off, driven off the back foot to cover, and they take the dangerous run
full on off stump and it's scooped over the infield, but only to the man at long on. Another decent over for the bowling side
full on off stump, driven down the ground to long off, no chance for the second though
back of a length outside off, goes towards the leg side and cuts past point
reverse sweep! But mistimed. Full on middle stump and he was quick to gauge the line. But can't find the power off the bat
walks across to the off side and sees the ball pitch on middle stump, lifted over short fine leg and smacked for four
back of a length outside off and he cuts off the front foot, beats point, thus allowing them to take the second
full toss outside off and it's driven down the ground past cover, it's gathering pace off the carpet, and beats wide long off to the fence. Botha moving along nicely, now
full ball wide outside off and Bravo brings out the Chumpiyaan dance! Wild slog from Billings, and it's only a slice. In the air, and pouched by White at point
slower ball on a good length outside leg stump, clipped off his pads to deep midwicket. Can't generate the power off the bat
slower full ball on off stump, tries to drive down the ground, but inside edge takes it through to the leg side
full and straight on middle and it's smacked over the non-striker's head! No long off present, and that's more runs to  Botha. Sixers nearing the hundred mark
slow and low! Good length on off stump but with no real pace from Bravo. Botha tries to drag this towards the leg side but it zips underneath his bat and through to the keeper
quicker ball to end the over, but Botha can't connect. It's short on middle and he tries to ramp this over the keeper, but too slow
full on leg stump, Dwarshuis backs away and punches this down the ground, takes off for a quick run and allows Botha to get back on strike
full on leg stump, tries to slog towards cow corner, but misses. Smacks his pads, and trickles down to third man
full on middle and leg, mistimed drive to cover, Dwarshuis gets off strike
full outside off and it's slogged over midwicket towards cow corner. Two fielders in the deep converge and keep it down to a couple
full outside off, and tries to cut square, but the ball stays low. Misses the shot, as it goes one-bounce to the keeper
full outside off and it's driven down the ground to long on. Finally the team hundred for the Sixers
full outside off and it's smacked! First six of the game, and it's dropped by security outside the ropes! Big wind up from Botha and dispatched over the deep midwicket boundary
good length on middle stump, but brings the pace down. Another slog from Botha but can't connect this time. Goes just over off stump and through to the keeper
full on middle stump and that's lifted once again! But not enough power behind it, as the skyer lands safe near square leg. No man there
full on middle stump and it's clipped off his toes to cow corner. Botha wants the two, but they can't. Settles for the single

short and wide outside off, and it's carved on the off side, but Richardson is there at deep point. Easy catch for the big man. It was well struck, but the sliced angle of the bat makes Dwarshuis sky that shot
full on middle stump and that's pushed to long on, early call for two, and they complete the second easily. Sixers finish on 111 for 8
back of a length outside off and the batsman misses the cut shot. Shapes away from the left hander, who went fishing at that ball
back of a length outside off once more, and another missed cut. Nice carry through to Nevill
short on middle stump and it's pulled along the ground. Mistimed shot, thus allowing square leg to clean up
full on leg stump and Finch attempts to flick this square off his pads, can't connect as it raps him on the front pad. Harris calls early for the single
dragged on! Full outside off and no footwork as he tries to drive, inside edge takes the ball onto middle stump. There's the breakthrough
full on middle stump and swinging away from the right hander, defended with soft hands to see the over out
full on off stump and it's clipped off his toes, well stopped by midwicket
back of a length on middle stump, punched off the back foot to mid on. Tight line to start off from Edwards
good length on middle stump, attempted punch down the ground but inside edge takes the ball down to fine leg
good length on middle stump, walks down the ground and defends off the front foot
back of a length outside off, taps this towards the off side and they race off
top edged, but goes for a six! Short on middle stump and Finch tried to pull, but sliced over the keeper's head. Short boundaries at Geelong, and that goes just over the ropes
short ball first up, angling across the batsman's body as he tries to pull. Misses the shot, and carries through to the keeper
peach! But just past White's outside edge. Good length on middle and angling across White's body. Tentative straight drive offered from the batsman, but the ball whizzes past
good length on off stump, defended with soft hands as Finch calls for the run. They scamper through before Nevill can collect the stray ball
full on middle stump, tries to drive down the ground but comes off the inside edge. Ricochets onto his pads
back of a length on middle stump, attempted pull that comes off the top edge. Goes down to fine leg for a single
good length on middle stump, taps this down as they race off for the run. Dwarshuis tries to effect a run out, by kicking the ball towards the stumps, but misses
full outside off and it's carved behind point for a boundary. Hit uppishly but away from the man at point
short on leg stump and it's pulled along the carpet to fine leg. The fielder almost got his feet tangled near the boundary
slow, full ball on middle stump, defended towards cover as they race off for another single
short on leg stump and it loops over White's head. Half a duck from the batsman, as the ball goes through to Nevill
slower ball full on middle stump, check-drive to cover after seeing the lack of pace
full on middle stump the attempted driven takes the inside edge. Ricochets onto his boot, and White's lucky that ball didn't dribble onto his stumps
good length on leg stump, offcutter to end the over. Taps this down with soft hands as they run off for another run
short ball on middle and leg, clipped off his hips behind square but straight to the man at square leg
good length on off stump, shuffles across to the off side to pull this fine down the leg side, but he bottom edges it onto his pads, and through to short fine
good length on middle and Finch backs away to smash over the off side, but bottom edges it once more onto his body
back of a length outside off, Finch makes extra room and cuts behind square, straight to cover point
good length on middle stump, another attempted cut from Finch that fetches no runs. Packed infield
back of a length on middle stump and spinning into Finch's body. The batsman backed away to make some extra room, but the bowler followed. Carved to point
full outside off and it's smacked! Over long off! Big stride forward and full follow through off the bat. A biggie!
back of a length outside off, cut late behind point as the fielder dives over it, trickles down to deep point
good length just outside off and it seams off the surface. An offcutter this time. Finch defends down the wrong line as the ball goes past his outside edge
full swing off the bat, and that's four more! Lifted over the non-striker's head, and Finch makes full use of the fielding restrictions
short on off stump and it's pulled off the back foot. Another boundary, as the deep backward square can't cut it off
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
good length outside off and turning into the right hander, punched off the front foot to mid on
full on off stump, and it's slogged! Down on one knee and smacked over deep midwicket. Deposits it into the grandstand
back of a length outside off, White backs away before punching this back to mid off
unconventional! Good length on off stump and White brings out the reverse paddle sweep. Enough power behind that shot, and fine enough to beat short third man
back of a length outside off, goes deep into the crease and cuts to deep point
back of a length outside off and Finch defends off the back foot, takes a thick edge through to the man at point
full on middle stump, stays low off the surface, defended off the front foot
back of a length outside off, cuts this square to deep point. Hit too well, therefore only the single
full outside off, taps this towards point but quick work from Jason Roy to intercept and cut the single off. The fielder slides in and forces White to scamper back
good length on off stump, White walks across to the off side and flicks this down to fine leg
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to mid off
good length on off stump, driven down the ground to Abbott
good length on off stump, stays deep in his crease and defends back to the bowler
full on middle stump and it's clipped off his toes to deep midwicket, easy runs
overpitched on middle stump and it's pinged back to the bowler with the straight bat. Not much Finch can do with that line and length
good length on middle and leg, attempts to clip off his pads, but takes the pad instead. Trickles fine down the leg side, as Nevill cleans up
short outside off and White carves this over the infield, unconventional since it was so close to his body, but enough muscle behind it to take it for four
good length on middle stump, cut towards the off side
good length on middle stump and the batsman tries to sweep this. But it's too short to sweep, paddled to short fine leg
good length on middle stump, paddled down the leg side for more runs
cheeky! Full ball on off stump and White reverse-paddles this fine past the keeper. Chase for short third man, but he does well to pull it back
good length outside off and it's firmly cut past point. Too good a shot to only earn him the single
back of a length outside off, and spinning into White, attempted to tap this back to Botha, as it takes a leading edge. But falls short of the bowler
good length on middle stump, clipped off his hips to deep backward square
full on middle stump, White walks across to the off side before working this off his toes to deep midwicket
full outside off and it's belted past point off the back foot. Punched with full precision between the two men in the infield
good length on off stump, punched off the back foot with the open bat. Straight to cover point
short outside off, but too slow to bother Finch. Swats this over point for another boundary
back of a length on middle stump, Finch backs away and cuts this powerfully along the carpet to deep point
full on off stump, worked off his toes to the man at midwicket, but played softly enough for the batsmen to scamper through for the run
full outside off, tapped behind square on the off side for another quick single. Too easy for these two
back of a length outside off stump and it's muscled past cover point. Not timed well, but good enough to trickle past the diving infielder
good length outside off and it's driven square while walking down the wicket. There's protection in the deep though
slapped! Backs away and punches this past cover and cover point on this occasion. Good-length ball outside off and just enough width for Finch to put it away
yorker on middle stump, dug away down the ground to mid on
full on off stump, attempts to take the leather off the ball by hitting it as hard as he can, but mistimed to short mid on
good length outside leg stump, tries to work this towards the leg side but takes the leading edge. Straight back to Sams
good length on off stump and angling across the right-hander's body, tries to cut but way too close to his body. Plays and misses
full toss wide outside off, carved over point with the sliced bat
good length on leg stump but angling across Finch's body, taps it down to third man, and Finch's second run forces him to dive as Nevill takes the bails off. Safe, however
short ball on middle stump, and it's too short. Finch tried to pull, but the ball flies over his helmet
good length on middle stump, attempts to pull but comes off the toe end. Straight to mid off
full and wide outside off, smashed past cover and there's no stopping that! The local boy gets his fifty
overpitched wide outside off, crunched to mid off, no run though

direct hit from Roy! Running throw from point to break the stumps. Good length ball on middle stump that White taps to point, they want the single, but the pick up and throw is a sight for sore eyes. Tremendous stuff from the fielder
back of a length on middle stump, extra bounce off the surface plus the ball goes down the leg side
good length on middle stump, Bravo tries to flick this square but raps him on the pads. Soft appeal for lbw, but the ball hit him way too high
full outside off and Bravo tries to lift this over the bowler's head. Misses completely, as he plays down the wrong line
good length outside off and it's punched off the back foot. Carves it between point and cover point for a comfortable double
good length on middle stump, defended off the back foot to see the over out
full and straight on off stump, driven uppishly over mid on's head. Just about enough distance to take this over the fielder
good length outside off and it's slogged over the infield. Comes off the sliced bat, and it goes over point. Work for deep point to do
short on middle stump and cuts the batsman in half! Stays a bit low as White misses the pull completely
good length on off stump, drags the pull square to deep midwicket. Played safely along the ground on this occasion
good length on leg stump, Bravo backed away but the bowler followed him. Punched back to Dwarshuis
good length on off stump but angling across Bravo's body. Tries to lift this over cover, but misses
overpitched full outside off and it's bunted over mid off. Once again, just enough power to clear the infield. Moves to 48
low full toss outside off, squeezes this fine to the man at third man. Onto 49 now with Renegades needing another four
lifted inside out over cover! And that's the win! Good length on off stump and it's smacked with precision with the high follow through. Melbourne Renegades win by eight wickets.
